text: int main ( ) { int i , j , k , n , p1 , p2 , cases , lines , largest ; scanf ( "%d" , & cases ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < cases ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & lines ) ; int mainArray [ lines ] ; mainArray [ 0 ] = 0 ; largest = 0 ; for ( j = 0 ; j < lines ; j ++ ) { for ( k = 0 ; k <= j ; k ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; if ( k == 0 ) { p1 = mainArray [ k ] ; mainArray [ k ] = p1 + n ; if ( mainArray [ k ] > largest ) largest = mainArray [ k ] ; } else if ( k == j ) { mainArray [ k ] = p1 + n ; if ( mainArray [ k ] > largest ) largest = mainArray [ k ] ; } else { p2 = mainArray [ k ] ; if ( p1 >= p2 ) mainArray [ k ] = p1 + n ; else mainArray [ k ] = p2 + n ; if ( mainArray [ k ] > largest ) largest = mainArray [ k ] ; p1 = p2 ; } } } printf ( "%d" , largest ) ; } return 0 ; }
